title: Help! Error in installing
body: I keep getting "error c++ 2005" has not been installed correctly when downloading the game

replies.body:
There are two separate root causes as to why this error is popping up:  Either your computer doesn't have the right permissions or you are missing key Windows services.  Given that Permission issues are much more common, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  

Let me know if you are experiencing any further issues!
